item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, former 'Cosby Show' star, dead at 54
item.description: Warner drowned off the coast of Costa Rica, local police told ABC News.

item.title: WATCH: Adam Sandler reveals 'Happy Gilmore 2' celebrity cameos
item.description: The actor spilled on who viewers can expect to see in the upcoming sequel -- including his own family.

item.title: Trump 'won't make a deal' with Washington Commanders if team refuses to change name
item.description: President Donald Trump threatened the Washington Commanders, stating he will not facilitate a deal for their new stadium if the team does not change i...

item.title: 5 million above-ground pools recalled after deaths of 9 children
item.description: Bestway, Intex and Polygroup above-ground pools are being recalled following the deaths of nine children.

item.title: WATCH: WNBA players share their dream 1-on-1 matchups
item.description: Paige Bueckers, Napheesa Collier and more shared their ideal matchup with "GMA."
